body_text: Is shiki fuujin a summoning jutsu? As we know, shiki fuujin jutsu summons the death god which takes the soul of the summoner and target. But is it a summoning jutsu or just a kind of chakra attack (like rasengan, chidori etc)?

Which is the most powerful summoning (effective and efficient)? I have been a great fan of Naruto for a long time, And I have seen lot of animals being summoned. But its been very hard for me to think which one of the summoning is the most powerful?
Please provide manga episode number or anime. I would like to check it again.
